1208290.name: Legends of Aria: Starter Pack
1208290.description:
Get a head start in Celador with the Legends of Aria Starer Pack. Certificates of Training grant your characters Master level skills* in a template of your choice, allowing you to get straight into the action. Gems can be spent in our in-game store, offering a variety of cosmetic and quality of life items.

Featuring:
  • 1 Certificates of Training
  • 600 Gems
  • 7 Days of Premium

Certificate of Training
Instantly become a Master Mage or Fighter.
*Acquire 130 Stats, x2 Master (80) and x3 Journeyman (70) skills in your chosen template.
1208290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
